title: 'Beating' human heart cells help spur drug discovery
text:
'Beating' human heart cells help spur drug discovery 10:05am EDT - 01:54 
InoCardia, a spin-off from Coventry University, is using donated human heart tissue to replicate the 'beating' action of heart muscle to aid pre-clinical testing of new drugs. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
InoCardia, a spin-off from Coventry University, is using donated human heart tissue to replicate the 'beating' action of heart muscle to aid pre-clinical testing of new drugs. Matthew Stock reports.
